analyzed: sidhda ācārya śrī śabara pādānām
om namaḥ śrī vajravilāsinyai
yasmin sura asura sura indra narendra vṛndā
s tad pāda padma patitāḥ bhramarāḥ śirobhiḥ
tam sidhdi sādhana payodhi mahā nidhānam
śrī lokanātha caraṇam śaraṇam vrajāmi
yā śrīḥ vajravilāsinī bhagavatī sambhoga bhaktyā adbhutam
sattvānām tathatā eva vigrahavatī rāga ujjvalā
tasyāḥ pāda yugam vande abhivandya uttamam
na śrutam na paṭhitam kiñcid cabareṇa adri cāriṇā
lokanātha ādhipatyena vadeyam kiyat akṣaram
ramye gandhamṛga sugandhini
manaḥ bhaṅga padam dattvā citta viśrāma parvate
tad pradeśe mahā ramye sugandhi kusuma āśraye
lasat kandara mākanda manda kūjita kokile
rakta aśoka ghana udyāne mama aśoka aṣṭamī tithau
guruṇā karuṇā aṅkena deśitā iyam vilāsinī
yathāvidhi samācāraiḥ eka citta samādhinā
śabaryām sahacaryāyām mayā sā abhimukhīkṛtā
vaśyā ākarṣaṇa stambhana māraṇa uccāṭānāni ca
añjanam guṭikā sidhdiḥ tathā anyāni bahūni ca
mahāmudrā padam labdhvā vācā saṃyācitam mayā

original: vidhinā bhāvayed yastvāṃ tasmai dāsyasi tatphalam ||9 ||
analyzed: vidhinā bhāvayet yaḥ tvām tasmai dāsyasi tad phalam
bhagavatā yathā uddiṣṭam sādhanam bhodhi sādhanam
tasyāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sāram likhet labdha nimittakaḥ
lobha kāyāḥ mā diyuktānām tīrthikānām viśeṣataḥ
hiṃsābhiḥ krūra cittānām na deyam sādhana uttamam
budhda tīrthika sattvānām a paripācita cetasām
vigama divya unmattānām na deyam sādhana uttamam
khañja kubja ādi ghaṇṭā ṣaṇḍhāḥ nām vyādhi duḥkhita cetasām
eteṣām nara nārīṇām na deyam sādhana uttamam
labdha abhiṣeka śudhdāya bahu jñāya kṛpālave
śānta kānta kṛtajñāya pradeyam divya sādhanam
guru ārādhana tuṣṭāya guhya viśvāsa rakṣiṇe
hīna udhdaraṇa cittāya
pradeyam divya sādhanam
sattva artha hita yuktāya kāruṇya bodhi kāṅkṣiṇe
nara nārī janāya idam pradeyam divya sādhanam
ādau sidhdi vidhim jñātvā guru ārādhana pūrvakam
guru vākya amṛtaiḥ tṛptaḥ tatas sādhanam ārabhet
parvata ādi guhya madhye sugandhi kusuma āśraye
bhāvanīyā sakā antena guhya vajra vilāsinī
śūnya veśmani svaccandam udyāne vijane vane
pūjanīyā sadā devī sādhanīyā yathāvidhi
ādau udvartanam kuryāt su gandha kusuma ādinā
kṣālayet guhya vajram ca mantra vidyā viśeṣataḥ
netrayoḥ añjanam kāryam keśa veśam ca śobhanam
vidyayā tat ca kartavyam nija lāvaṇya hetave
padma pāṇi talam kuryāt bahu mūla yugam tathā
sukha sparśam sadāmodi sukha saubhāgya hetave
pravāla kāntam adharam bhālam sindūra rājitam
lalāṭe lākṣakā rekham karṇam vā aśoka bhūṣitam
tyaktvā anya ābharaṇāni eṣā muktā hāra pralambinī
sādhakaḥ api varam rūpam padmanarteśvarasya ca
kṛṣṭam madanam āsadya sukha ādyam vidyayā saha

original: tāvanmātraṃ tu kartavyaṃ na mano vikalaṃ yathā ||25 ||
analyzed: tāvat mātram tu kartavyam na manaḥ vikalam yathā
dvayoḥ dvayoḥ caturdaśyām tathā aṣṭamyām vidhānataḥ
rātrau eva arcayet devīm mase vāra catuṣṭayam
pradīpam jvālayet tatra prabhākara sama prabham

original: yathā prakāśate viśvaṃ vimvaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ ||27 ||
analyzed: yathā prakāśate viśvam vimvam pratyaṅgam ca viśeṣataḥ
sidhdaya rtham upaviśya atha sattva artha akṛta cetaśā
mahāmudrā padam gantum
lajjā ādikam parityajya kopa lobha ādikam tathā
aṇu mātrām ghṛṇām śaṅkām dūratas parivarjayet
sukha āsana samā sīnaḥ mukta kuntalaḥ
sva jaṅghām kiṃcid ākuñcya dakṣiṇa aṅgulam prasārayet
tayoḥ madhya gatām vidyām nivasanām mukta kuntalām
tathā lāvaṇya sampannām kuryāt tu su paricitām
dattvā tyakta padma utkaṭa āsanām
devī bāhu dvayam iva tasyāḥ bāhu dvayam caret
tasyāḥ dharma udaya āpanne kṛtvā vartula maṇḍalam
vāma kara amṛta aṅgulyā kuṅkumaiḥ raktacandanaiḥ
tadanu dharma udaya ākāram tatra eva maṇḍalam caret
etat maṇḍala mantram tu mantrodhdāre asti bhāṣitam
etat mantram samuccārya sītkāram ca samuccaret
ādi akṣareṇa mantreṇa dadyat puṣpam sumadhyake
śūnya tām bhāvayet yogī catur bramha vihāriṇaḥ
om śūnyatā ādikam mantram manasā uccārayet tatas
devyāḥ pañcākṣaram mantram pañca sthāneṣu vinyaset
śiraḥ vadana citteṣu nābhau vajre tridhā kramam
pañca sthāneṣu vidyāyāḥ yathā āropitam ātmanaḥ
tathā mantra arcanam kuryāt hitvā śūnyatā ādi mantrakam
atha udaya mahā rāgam bhāvayet sūrya maṇḍalam
vitatam su manaḥ ramyam rakta ākaram samujjvalam
tatra dharma udayām dhyātvā rakta ādi akṣara sambhavām
manaḥ hlāda karīm pītām kṣarat lākṣā drava ujjvalām
sarva kāma sukha dhārām sphurat aṃśu abja vibhramām
dharma sambhoga nirmāṇa sarva ākāra vilakṣaṇam
abhiṇaya ādayaḥ raktam jagat cadra arka miśritam
bhaga garbha sthitam paśyet bhramantam cakra sannibham
tasya upari mahā bījam tapta akāñcana vigraham
pañcākṣara mahā mantram jvalantam kalpa vahni vat
raktam jagattrayam
dravībhūtam jagat sarvam viśantam tatra maṇḍale
draṣṭavyam vaśagam viśvam satvānām kṛta cetasām
etad pariṇatām devīm bandhūka kusuma prabhām
rakta tapta hema ujjvalām gaurīm nija lāvaṇya bhūṣitām
nava yauvana sampannām karṇe ca aśoka śobhitām
lalāṭe lākṣakā rekhām muktā hāra vilambinīm
sarva lakṣaṇa sampūrṇām anya alaṅkāra varjitām
abhivāñchita saubhāgyām nagnām vimukta kuṇḍalām
padma narte dhvaja ucchrāya samāropita paṅkajām
utkaṭāsana nṛtya sthām kaṭākṣa smita bhaṅgurām
vakrīkṛta uddhṛta bhujām vajra karti kara udyatām
vāme pāśa dharā sārām līlā āndolita mekhalām
ullasat bhidura sparśaiḥ kṣarat kamala vibhramām
nitamba jaghana āsphāla raṇat jṛmbhita rājitām
sphurat ākuñca yogena vaḍavā vat camatkṛtām
tām eva agra sthitām vidyām dhyāyāt vajra vilāsinīm
ekadā eva samudbhūtam sama bīja sukha aṅkuram
abhivyañjita roma agram sahaja āsakta cetasam
sarva lakṣaṇa sampūrṇam dvis aṣṭa varṣa vigraham
nava yauvana sampannam karṇe ca aśoka śobhitam
suvarṇa tilakā rekham muktā hāra avalambitam
nija lāvaṇya sampannam anya alaṅkāra varjitam
vāma kuñcitayā kiñcid vitatam dakṣiṇa aṅgayā
jaṅghayā surata ācārya kiñcid uttāna śāyinam
kucā bhakti āliṅgana mudrakam
su vyaktam guhya vajreṇa nartayantam vilāsinīm
pīta padma dharam vāme dakṣiṇe vajra dhāriṇam
āliṅgayantam ācumbam muhur ābaddha līlayā
kurvantam ati rāgeṇa suratam vāji kūjitam
sahaja ānanda sukha āsvādaiḥ ardha unmīlita locanam
iti evaṃbhūtam ātmānam bhāvayet surata īśvaram
mahā sukham iva avyaktam padmanarteśvaram vibhum
atas asyāḥ mahādevyāḥ tapta kāñcana raśmibhiḥ
mithas samarasībhūya trailokyam sudhira ambudhim
tad madhye sthitam ātmānam devyā saha vinodinam
mahā rāga sukha āyātam trailokya udara vartinam
tadanu cintayet tūrṇam abhiṣiñcanti mām puras
tathāgatāḥ lokapālāḥ kinnara asura mānavāḥ
rambhā tilottamā ca eva nānā
puṣpa dhūpa ādibhiḥ vādyaiḥ nānā nṛtya mahā utsavaiḥ
atha maṇḍala pūjām ca kārayet trayatas gataḥ
kāya vāc citta pūjābhiḥ trayam karma viśodhayet
mūlamantram samuccārya devyāḥ nāma samuccaret
saḥ iti uccāraṇam kṛtvā pūjayet guhya maṇḍalam
vāma vṛddha amṛtābhyām tu dhṛtvā puṣpa phala ādikam
dātavyam sama rasam vāra trayam anāvilam
sva kāyam kuliśam tadvat saṃpūjya lalitā tratam
tena eva mantra jāpena devyāḥ mantram prapūjayet

original: lalāṭaṃ locane kaṇṭhaṃ ghrāṇaṃ galadvayaṃ tathā |
analyzed: lalāṭam locane kaṇṭham ghrāṇam gala dvayam tathā

original: dhūpaṃ ca arayet tatra yathāvidhi sugandhitam ||72 ||
analyzed: dhūpam ca arayet tatra yathāvidhi sugandhitam
bhagavatyāḥ ca kartavyā padmanartā īśvarasya ca
vajrapīṭha ādi pūjā ādau tena eva krama yogataḥ
tāmbūlam ca pradātavyam karpūra ādi su pūritam
anyonyam bhakṣaṇam kṛtvā gāthā pāṭham tatas caret
mahā sukha prasannaḥ tvam abhinnaḥ asi mayā saha
rantum āliṅganam dehi narteśvara namaḥ astu te
mahā sukha prasannā tvam abhinnā asi mayā saha
rantum āliṅganam dehi vilāsini namaḥ astu te
iti gāthām samuccārya sampuṭa añjali karmaṇā
anyonya vandanām kuryāt madhura akṣara bhāṣaṇaiḥ
eka bīja samudbhūtam prajñā upāya mayam jagat
sarva nārī mayī devī sarva upāya mayaḥ prabhuḥ
abhinnaḥ asi mahā rāja sahaja artham samudyataḥ
ehi melāpakam kartum vajra mudrā maharddhikaḥ
gāthā dvayam samuccārya citta smaraṇa pūrvakam
mithas āliṅganam kuryāt nava puṣpi prayogataḥ
āliṅganam cumbanam tu stanayoḥ mardanam śanais
darśanam sparśanam yoneḥ vikāśam liṅga gharṣaṇam
praveśa ullāsanam padme praveśaḥ traya bhāgataḥ
maṇi madhya sa mūlaiḥ ca na vapuṣi prakīrtitaḥ

original: cumbanaṃ tu pradātavyaṃ yatra puṣpaiḥ supūjitam |
analyzed: cumbanam tu pradātavyam yatra puṣpaiḥ su pūjitam

nakha kṣatam na dātavyam paścāttāpa nivṛttaye
vaktra āsavam ca pātavyam vāji kūjita pūrvakam
śunī danta arpaṇa pātena tadvat daṃśanam śanais
kiñcid uttānakaḥ bhūtvā sthātavyam deva mudrayā

niścalāt tu sukham buddhayet ati bācā
lanāt cañcalam manaḥ
helayā khelayā devī sahaja āsakta cetasaḥ
rāga ambhodhi jalam tartum su nānau
kā iyam upasthitā
guru vākya udayam prāptam vāhayet vāhaka svaraiḥ
matvā sthāna trayam marma grāha utsarga gata agatam
iyam āyu pratam khamam akṣara
manthāna sthānam tu boddhavyam vilakṣaṇa kṣaṇa uditam

original: vajreṇa kṣobhayed devīṃ bodhicittaṃ na cotsṛjet ||90 ||
analyzed: vajreṇa kṣobhayet devīm bodhi cittam na ca utsṛjet
utsṛte bodhi citte tu kutas tatra mahā sukham

punar vajre samāyātam paśyedha ayātayātakam

etad yoga vara apetaḥ na siddhaḥ bhavati mudrayā

lakṣaṇam sarva siddhi vidhau jñeyam sarvajñena yathā uditam
śvāsa lābhaḥ bhavet māse ṣaṣ māse vā āñcitam phalam
rṛddhi siddhiḥ bhavet abde vaśyā ākṛṣṭi puraḥsarā
kiṅkarībhūya sevante sa deva asura manuṣāḥ

original: urvaśyādimukhāḥ sarve matryasthānāṃ tu kā kathā ||141 ||
analyzed: urvaśī ādi mukhāḥ sarve matrī asthānām tu kā kathā
sadā abhyāsa rataiḥ samyak pūrṇe dvādaśa vatsare
smṛtvā yathā uditam pūrvam abhyaset tad anantaram
ayathākṛtaḥ ārambhaḥ devī kṣobhaḥ patiṣyati
adhigamya āgamāt sarvam agamat rāga saṃkaṭam

original: gurupādaṃ vinā vatsa mā gacca yoginīnayam ||144 ||
analyzed: guru pādam vinā vatsa mā gacca yoginī nayam

original: yadi candrastathā sūryo bhūmau patati śīryate |
analyzed: yadi candraḥ tathā sūryaḥ bhūmau patati śīryate

original: tathāpi lokanāthasya nedaṃ vaco mṛṣā bhavet ||145 ||
analyzed: tathā api loka nāthasya nā idam vacaḥ mṛṣā bhavet
karuṇākara nāthena kṛpayā deśitaḥ mama
yathā eva matta mātaṅgaḥ gurubhiḥ jālaka ādibhiḥ
pravaśīkriyate vijñaiḥ vijñānam ca mahā udayaiḥ
yathā mahauṣadham kiñcid su svādam vyādhi ghātakam
prajñā upāya sukham tadvat helayā kleśa nāśanam
sarvasya ramaṇī ramyā rāgiṇām śuddha rāgiṇām
ekasya gala pāśaḥ syāt aparasya bandha kartikā
aho upāya sāmarthyam mahāyāna anuyāyinām
kāminīm ghāḍham āliṅgaya bhuñjanti makaradhvajam
rasa āśa rasa
sya aṃśaḥ vyādhiḥ vividha ghana kāma eka phala daḥ
sadā sattva ārāmā ramaṇa sahaja ānanda muditā
tadtas bhūyas bhūyas bhuvana sukha santuṣṭa manasaḥ
vinā
jagat akhilam āproti tathatām
iti guhyasamayatantre mahāyoginījālatantre śrīmat lokanātha pādena deśitam
yoginīsarvasvam nāma guhya vajravilāsinī sādhanam samāptam
kṛtiḥ iyam siddha ācārya śabara pādānām
